should apply heuristic penalty for heuristic-only evidence
should apply explicit bonus for explicit evidence
should apply pattern bonus for multiple categories
should apply evidence multiplier with diminishing returns
should reject score with mismatched level
should return empty score for empty array
should return same score for single item
should merge multiple scores with weighted average
should merge positive and negative factors
should not match rules for wrong evidence type

should not match equals with wrong value

should return empty array for no matching rules

should create engine with default config
should create engine with custom config

should skip validation when validateOnAdd is disabled
should add an edge to the graph

should allow duplicate edges when allowDuplicateEdges is true
should validate edge source exists when validateOnAdd is true
should validate edge target exists when validateOnAdd is true
should create and add edge by source and target ids
should return true for existing node
should return false for non-existing node
should return true for existing edge

should return false for non-existing edge
should return undefined for non-existing node

should return true for cyclic graph
should return false for empty graph
